name: Elder Ghost Boar
description: The Elder Ghost Boar is a massive spectral creature with enhanced physical strength, characterized by its intimidating size and incorporeal nature.
memorable: It phases through obstacles while being able to communicate with spirits, adding a haunting element to encounters.
goals: To wreak havoc on intruders and possibly gather information from the spirits of slain creatures.
relations: May be encountered alongside other undead or spectral entities.
environment: Typically found in haunted or cursed locations.
strengths: Exceptional Strength allows it to deliver devastating melee attacks; ability to phase through solid objects provides tactical advantages.
weaknesses: Very low Dexterity makes it susceptible to ranged attacks.
attacks: Performs two tusk attacks that deal substantial slashing damage with a potential knockdown effect.
most_powerful_ability: The **Spirit Conduit** ability allows it to temporarily channel spirits for communication.
additional_information: Incorporeal ability enhances maneuvering in combat.
Relentless trait can prolong battles by allowing survival at 1 hit point.
Charge ability adds significant damage on successful attacks after moving.
Ghostly Slip provides damage resistance and escape from grapples.
Can create unique roleplaying scenarios by communicating with the dead.

powerful tusked creature with spirit communication
monstrous entity with devastating charge attack
undead boar that uses ghostly abilities in combat
